name: Sales Order - Permission Query
script:
conditions = []

# If NOT System Manager
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": "System Manager"
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabSales Order`.name NOT IN "
        "(SELECT amended_from FROM `tabSales Order` WHERE amended_from IS NOT NULL)"
    )

# If user IS Warehouse User
if frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": "Warehouse User"
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabSales Order`.docstatus = 1 "
        "AND `tabSales Order`.reservation_status = 'Reserve with Delivery' "
        "AND `tabSales Order`.delivery_status IN ('Not Delivered', 'Partly Delivered')"
    )

# Combine all conditions
conditions = " AND ".join(conditions) if conditions else ""

name: Delivery Note - Permission Query
script:
if not frappe.db.get_value("Has Role", [["parent", "=", frappe.session.user], ['role', "=", "System Manager"]]):
    conditions = "`tabDelivery Note`.name NOT IN (SELECT amended_from FROM `tabDelivery Note` WHERE amended_from IS NOT NULL)"

name: Sales Invoice - Permission Query
script:
conditions = []

# If user is NOT System Manager
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": "System Manager"
}):
    conditions.append("`tabSales Invoice`.is_opening = 'No'")
    conditions.append(
        "`tabSales Invoice`.name NOT IN "
        "(SELECT amended_from FROM `tabSales Invoice` WHERE amended_from IS NOT NULL)"
    )

# Final condition string
conditions = " AND ".join(conditions) if conditions else ""

name: Account - Permission Query
script:
role1 = frappe.db.get_value("Has Role", [["parent", "=", frappe.session.user], ['role', "=", "Libya Team"]])
role2 = frappe.db.get_value("Has Role", [["parent", "=", frappe.session.user], ['role', "=", "Chief Executive Officer"]])
if role1 and not role2:
    conditions = "restrict_account_view='No'"

    conditions = "selling=1"

name: Receipt Voucher - Permission Query
Payment Voucher - Permission Query
script:
conditions = []

# If NOT System Manager
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": "System Manager"
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabPayment Voucher`.name NOT IN "
        "(SELECT amended_from FROM `tabPayment Voucher` WHERE amended_from IS NOT NULL)"
    )

# If NOT CEO or Accounts Manager
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": ["in", ["Chief Executive Officer", "Accounts Manager"]]
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabPayment Voucher`.paid_to IN "
        "(SELECT name FROM `tabAccount` WHERE restrict_account_view = 'No')"
    )

# Join conditions safely
conditions = " AND ".join(conditions) if conditions else ""

name: Transfer Voucher - Permission Query
script:
if not frappe.db.get_value("Has Role", [["parent", "=", frappe.session.user], ['role', "=", "System Manager"]]):
    conditions = "`tabTransfer Voucher`.name NOT IN (SELECT amended_from FROM `tabTransfer Voucher` WHERE amended_from IS NOT NULL)"

name: Debt Voucher - Permission Query
script:
conditions = []

# If NOT System Manager
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": "System Manager"
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabDebt Voucher`.name NOT IN "
        "(SELECT amended_from FROM `tabDebt Voucher` WHERE amended_from IS NOT NULL)"
    )

# If NOT CEO or Accounts Manager
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": ["in", ["Chief Executive Officer", "Accounts Manager"]]
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabDebt Voucher`.from_or_to_account IN "
        "(SELECT name FROM `tabAccount` WHERE restrict_account_view = 'No')"
    )

# Combine conditions
conditions = " AND ".join(conditions) if conditions else ""

name: Clearing Voucher - Permission Query
script:
conditions = []

# Check System Manager role
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": "System Manager"
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabClearing Voucher`.name NOT IN "
        "(SELECT amended_from FROM `tabClearing Voucher` WHERE amended_from IS NOT NULL)"
    )

# Check CEO or Accounts Manager role
if not frappe.db.exists("Has Role", {
    "parent": frappe.session.user,
    "role": ["in", ["Chief Executive Officer", "Accounts Manager"]]
}):
    conditions.append(
        "`tabClearing Voucher`.from_account IN "
        "(SELECT name FROM `tabAccount` WHERE restrict_account_view = 'No') "
        "AND `tabClearing Voucher`.to_account IN "
        "(SELECT name FROM `tabAccount` WHERE restrict_account_view = 'No')"
    )

# Final condition string
conditions = " AND ".join(conditions) if conditions else ""

name: Update Remarks in Sales Invoice (After Submit)
Auto-Creation of Purchase Receipt Upon Submitting Purchase Invoice
script:
items_to_load = []
for item in doc.items:
    items_to_load.append({
        'item_code': item.item_code,
        'qty': item.qty,
        'received_qty': item.qty,
        'production_year': item.production_year,
        'purchase_order': item.purchase_order,
        'purchase_order_item': item.po_detail,
        'purchase_invoice': doc.name,
        'purchase_invoice_item': item.name,
        'warehouse': frappe.db.get_value('Stock Settings', 'Stock Settings', 'default_warehouse'),
        'rate': item.rate,
        'price_list_rate': item.price_list_rate,
        'expense_account': frappe.db.get_value('Company', doc.company, "stock_received_but_not_billed")
    })
if not doc.is_return and not doc.update_stock:
    frappe.get_doc(dict(
    doctype = 'Purchase Receipt',
    title = doc.title,
    supplier_delivery_note = doc.title,
    supplier = doc.supplier,
    company = doc.company,
    docstatus = 0,
    posting_date = frappe.utils.nowdate(),
    posting_time = '00:00:00',
    set_posting_time = 1,
    currency = doc.currency,
    conversion_rate = doc.conversion_rate,
    disable_rounded_total = 1,
    buying_price_list = doc.buying_price_list,
    price_list_currency = doc.price_list_currency,
    plc_conversion_rate = doc.plc_conversion_rate,
    set_warehouse = frappe.db.get_value('Stock Settings', 'Stock Settings', 'default_warehouse'),
    taxes_and_charges = doc.taxes_and_charges,
    taxes = doc.taxes,
    apply_discount_on = doc.apply_discount_on,
    discount_amount = doc.discount_amount,
    remarks = doc.title,
    freight_account = doc.freight_account,
    freight_account_currency = doc.freight_account_currency,
    freight_amount = doc.freight_amount,
    freight_exchange_rate = doc.freight_exchange_rate,
    inspection_account = doc.inspection_account,
    inspection_account_currency = doc.inspection_account_currency,
    inspection_amount = doc.inspection_amount,
    inspection_exchange_rate = doc.inspection_exchange_rate,
    clearance_account = doc.clearance_account,
    clearance_amount = doc.clearance_amount,
    transport_account = doc.transport_account,
    transport_amount = doc.transport_amount,
    foreign_bank_charges_account = doc.foreign_bank_charges_account,
    foreign_bank_charges_account_currency = doc.foreign_bank_charges_account_currency,
    foreign_bank_charges_amount = doc.foreign_bank_charges_amount,
    foreign_bank_charges_exchange_rate = doc.foreign_bank_charges_exchange_rate,
    local_bank_charges_account = doc.local_bank_charges_account,
    local_bank_charges_amount = doc.local_bank_charges_amount,
    items = items_to_load
)).insert(ignore_permissions=True)

name: Restarting Stuck Process Payment Reconciliation
script:
first_time = frappe.utils.add_to_date(frappe.utils.now_datetime(), hours=-0.24) # for one hour
second_time = frappe.utils.add_to_date(frappe.utils.now_datetime(), hours=-72) # for one hour
docs = frappe.db.get_list("Process Payment Reconciliation", [["creation", "between", [second_time, first_time]], ["status", "=", "Running"]])
for doc in docs:
    frappe.call("erpnext.accounts.doctype.process_payment_reconciliation.process_payment_reconciliation.pause_job_for_doc", docname = doc.name)
    frappe.call("erpnext.accounts.doctype.process_payment_reconciliation.process_payment_reconciliation.trigger_job_for_doc", docname = doc.name)

name: Auto-Payment Reconcilliation
Validating ZERO Rate in Sales Order
Validating ZERO Rate in Sales Invoice
Production Year Validation in Purchase Invoice
Production Year Validation in Purchase Receipt
Production Year Validation in Sales Order
Validation of Purchase Receipt Grand Total vs Purchase Invoice Grand Total
Auto-Creation/Submission of Sales Invoice Upon Delivery Note Submission
script:
def stringify_obj(obj):
    return str(obj)
s_doc = json.dumps(doc.as_dict(), default=stringify_obj)
si_name = frappe.call("libya_customizations.server_script.delivery_note.create_si_from_dn", doc=s_doc)
sales_invoice = frappe.get_doc("Sales Invoice", si_name)
sales_invoice.submit()

# updating sales invoice with sales order
so = frappe.db.get_value("Sales Order", doc.items[0].against_sales_order, ["is_paid", "payment_account", "custom_payment_value", "custom_payment_value_is_different"], as_dict = True)
sales_invoice.is_paid = so.is_paid
sales_invoice.payment_account = so.payment_account
sales_invoice.custom_payment_value = so.custom_payment_value
sales_invoice.custom_payment_value_is_different = so.custom_payment_value_is_different
sales_invoice.save(ignore_permissions=True)
